mapper.select: select cd.id as case_id, cg.module as group_module, cg.comment as group_comment, cd.comment as case_comment, cd.protocol_type as protocol_type, cd.request_data as request_data, cd.pre_result as pre_result, cd.host_id as host_id, cd.is_cache as is_cache from case_workflow cw, case_group cg, case_detail cd where cw.group_id = cg.id and cg.id = cd.group_id and cg.is_run = true and cg.deleted = false and cd.is_run = true and cd.deleted = false and cw.id = #{workflowId}

select ch.host as host, concat(ch.protocol, '://', ch.host, if(ch.port is null, '', concat(':', ch.port)), ca.api) as url, request_method as method, request_data_type as data_type from case_host ch, case_api ca where ch.id = ca.host_id and ca.id = #{id}
